source.1938d34e:
### Note: 
* All addresses are on Russian
* In column resettlement_period value "не известно" means "is unknown"
* In column resettlement_period value "г." means "years"
source.1b4f74f2:
### Read data

This file contains an entry for each house address, containing:

* unom - unique ID of house
* city_area - area in the Moscow city, totally 12
* disctrict - Moscow districts
* house_address - each house address including: street, house number, sometimes the building of the house
* wave - number of wave of Renovation
* period - wave time period
